summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        Your task: Provide a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image, focusing on its relevance to gameplay. 
        Describe key visual elements such as characters, enemies, UI components (e.g., health bars, icons), environments, or any text hints present. 
        Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where the player character is engaged in combat with a large enemy named "Earth Wolf," as indicated by the health bar at the bottom of the screen. The environment is a grassy field with sparse trees and traditional architecture in the background, suggesting a historical or fantasy setting. The user interface includes various icons on the left and right sides of the screen, likely representing abilities, items, or actions available to the player. The health bar at the bottom shows the status of the Earth Wolf, indicating the progress of the battle. The player character appears to be in a defensive or evasive position, possibly recovering from an attack.
